title: An Interview with Billie Lindsay

abstract: I am proud to have served with the Royal Australian Army Nursing Corp.
description: Billie had just gone through training as a nurse when she was whisked away to war. She tells how she was immediately signed up while waiting for a friend, her time in Malaya and considers the way we look at war today and how her time in the army stood her in good stead later on in life.
